meanings.sent1: The shirt looked worn after many washes.
meanings.sent2: She wore a worn-out pair of shoes to the park.
meanings.sent3: The worn book had been read so many times, the pages were falling out.
meanings.sent4: His face was like a worn map, showing the paths of his life.
meanings.sent5: The old teddy bear had a worn patch where it had been hugged the most.

meanings.definition: showing signs of age or use
meanings.sent1: The worn wooden floor creaked under their feet.
meanings.sent2: The worn handle of the door was smooth from years of opening and closing.
meanings.sent3: The worn-out sofa had seen better days, but it was still comfortable.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was warm and welcoming, despite the worn lines around her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out car sputtered to a stop on the side of the road.

meanings.sent1: After a long day at work, she felt worn and ready for bed.
meanings.sent2: The hiker was worn out after climbing the steep mountain.
meanings.sent3: The worn runner crossed the finish line with a smile of accomplishment.
meanings.sent4: His voice sounded worn from hours of talking on the phone.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out puppy curled up for a nap after playing all day.
